content:
That's a great selection of records! You've got a good mix of genres, eras, and iconic cover art that will add visual interest to your display. The camera-inspired artwork and photography-themed covers will also tie in nicely with your Contax T2 point-and-shoot camera.

Here are a few more suggestions to consider:

* **Add a personal touch:** Consider adding a personal touch to your display by including a record that holds special meaning to you, such as a favorite album from your teenage years or a record that was given to you by a loved one.
* **Vary the record sizes:** Mixing up the sizes of your records can add visual interest to your display. Consider including a few 12-inch records, as well as some 10-inch or 7-inch records, to create a visually appealing arrangement.
* **Use record risers:** If you have a lot of records with similar covers, consider using record risers to create a tiered display. This will add depth and visual interest to your display, and make it easier to see each record.
* **Add some decorative elements:** Consider adding some decorative elements, such as vintage camera lenses, guitar picks, or music-themed posters, to tie in with the photography and music themes.

Overall, your selection of records is shaping up to be a great representation of your personal taste in music and photography. I think you'll have a fantastic display that will spark conversations and inspire nostalgia!
